Item.name: Cigarette Pack
Item.description: A polycarbonate container designed with a flavor-protective foil, and sealed through a transparent airtight plastic film.

Item.name: Cigarette
Item.description: Quality tobacco in a thin polycarbonate film, ready for smoking.

Item.name: Hand-rolled Cigarette
Item.description: Loose tobacco from questionable sources, rolled into a thin polycarbonate film for smoking.

Item.name: Corrigodone
Item.aliases: pill bottle of Corrigodone,canister of corrigodone
Item.description: An revolutionary drug made by some of the best minds around, a drug that has single handedly revolutionised the way the public sees hospitals by allowing an almost instant recovery for those whom have been afflicted by physical trauma

Item.name: Auxiliorizine
Item.description: Heals slower and is slightly weaker than Corrigodone but as a bonus it heals oxygenloss and bleeding.

Item.name: Fibrinozine
Item.description: A hemostatic agent that slows down bleeding.

Midazolam.name: Midazolam
Midazolam.description: An anesthetic that can be used to knock someone out for a long period of time.

SurgeryKit.name: Surgery Kit
SurgeryKit.description: A kit for emergency surgeries for both external and internal wounds.

Item.name: Sulphuric Acid
Item.description: A strong acid that causes burns when in contact with skin. Used as an ingredient in several poisons.

Item.name: Broad-spectrum Antibiotics
Item.description: A strong antibiotic that acts against a wide range of disease-causing bacteria and even parasites, though with side effect of liver damage.

Item.name: Activated Charcoal
Item.description: Activated charcoal, also known as activated carbon is used to treat poisonings and overdoses following oral ingestion.

Item.name: Naltrexone
Item.description: Naltrexone is a medication primarily used to manage alcohol or opioid dependence.
